channel.title: Tidyverse on Data Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Tidyverse on Data Analytics

item.title: Tweet Analysis with R
item.description:
In this blog, I am going to use various R packages mainly from the tidyverse package by Hadley wickham to analyze over 20k tweets from lordmwesh twitter archive.

lordmwesh is an ICT policy expert with vast skill in Internet governance. He was extremely instrumental in my formative stages of my career and continue to walk with me in my journey of data analytics.
